Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sarah W
Reviews.Content: stayed nights march 2012 tucked street minutes walk san marco quiet hotel warm friendly welcome helpful people spotlessly clean crisp bed linen changed daily bathroom newly refurbished spotlessly clean shower breakfast 3 tables bit tight squeeze breakfast choices positive experience stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel and close to San Marco”
Reviews.Author: Likwait
Reviews.Content: close san marcos square hotel staff absolutely delight deal helpful especially thank gentelman waited location easy reach boat station arrived late night venice nightmare reach hotels bathroom nice clean bed reasonably comfortable nice coffee machine breakfast amount paid little concidering time supposed central ac unit dont running weather bit warm day thats ok bread selection cheese breakfast recommend hotel mind staying

Reviews.Content: happy location offer bring breakfast feel crowded breakfast nice touch owner time questions catch clean fan air conditioning nice bathroom luxuries nicer hotels
